meta.description: Maximize the daily profit of a company producing two types of products with constraints on labor and material costs.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products produced by the company

params.name: assembly_time
params.description: Assembly time required for each product type in hours

params.name: testing_time
params.description: Testing time required for each product type in hours

params.name: raw_material_cost
params.description: Cost of raw materials for each product type in dollars

params.name: market_value
params.description: Market value of each product type in dollars

params.name: max_assembly_hours
params.description: Maximum available assembly labor hours per day

params.name: max_testing_hours
params.description: Maximum available testing hours per day

params.name: overtime_cost
params.description: Cost of overtime assembly labor per hour

params.name: max_overtime_hours
params.description: Maximum overtime assembly labor hours per day

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of products produced of each type

objective.name: max_daily_profit
objective.expr: sum((market_value[p] - raw_material_cost[p]) * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS) - overtime_cost * overtime_hours
objective.description: Maximize the daily profit by considering market value, raw material cost, and overtime cost

constraints.name: assembly_hours_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(assembly_time[p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS) + overtime_hours
constraints.description: Total assembly hours including overtime must not exceed the maximum available hours

constraints.name: testing_hours_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(testing_time[p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total testing hours must not exceed the maximum available hours
